cards.title: Red Rifle
powers: Add 1 token to your trueshot pool. Draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power.
One hero may deal 1 target 1 projectile damage.
Up to two hero ongoing cards may be played now.

cards.title: Called Shot
body: {RedRifle} deals 1 target 3 projectile damage.
Add 1 or remove 3 tokens from your trueshot pool. If you removed 3 tokens this way, destroy 1 Ongoing or Environment card.
cards.flavorText: “She only built that thing today.{BR}There's [b]gotta[/b] be a weak spot.”

cards.title: Energy Burst
body: {RedRifle} deals each non-hero target 1 energy damage.
If you have 5 or more tokens in your trueshot pool, the damage is irreducible.
If you have 10 or more tokens in your trueshot pool, destroy 1 hero Ongoing or Equipment card.
cards.flavorText: “If you could [b]warn[/b] us next time you{BR}do that, it would be really [b]really[/b] nice.”

cards.title: Full Auto
body: At the start of your turn, add 1 token to your trueshot pool.
At the end of your turn, if your trueshot pool is smaller than 5, destroy this card.
powers: Remove any number of tokens from your trueshot pool. {RedRifle} deals up to that many targets that much Projectile damage, evenly distributed.
cards.flavorText: “How did the bear get in the{BR}factory sounds like a joke,{BR}but I assure you it is [b]not.[/b]”

cards.title: Hair Trigger
body: Whenever a non-hero target enters play, {RedRifle} may deal that target 1 projectile damage.
If that target takes no damage, add 1 token to your trueshot pool.
cards.flavorText: “Where do these yeasty bastards{BR}keep coming from!? I swear{BR}I've picked off like thirty of 'em.”

cards.title: Indescriminate Fabrication
body: Reveal the top card of each deck. Put any revealed targets and equipment into play. Discard the other revealed cards.
For each card put into play this way, add 1 token to your trueshot pool.
cards.flavorText: “And you get a scanner.{BR}And you get a scanner!{BR}And you get a scanner?”

cards.title: Nano Plate
body: Reduce damage dealt to {RedRifle} by 1.
At the start of your turn either add 1 token to your trueshot pool, or {RedRifle} gains 1 HP.
cards.flavorText: “Oh. Oh!? Oh yeah!{BR}See, [b]that's[/b] why you don't mess{BR}with the guy wearing an armor suit!”

cards.title: Overclocking
body: Increase damage dealt by {RedRifle} by 1.
When this card is destroyed, {RedRifle} deals himself 2 energy damage. Add 3 tokens to your trueshot pool.
powers: Play 2 one-shot cards now. Destroy this card.

cards.title: Powered Shot
body: Remove up to 8 tokens from your trueshot pool and choose a target.
For every 2 tokens removed, {RedRifle} deals that target 1 irreducible damage.
That damage is projectile, energy, sonic, and radiant, in that order.
cards.flavorText: “He's [b]already[/b] dead. Dude's{BR}probably gonna think this tickles.”

cards.title: Precise Shot
body: {RedRifle} deals 1 target X projectile damage, where X equals the number of villain and environment targets in play, to a maximum of the number of tokens in your trueshot pool.
This damage cannot be redirected.

cards.title: Ricochet
body: Whenever {RedRifle} is dealt damage, add 1 token to your trueshot pool.
cards.flavorText: “[b]ow!![/b] hey!{BR}oh wait, now I know{BR}where that shot came from.”

cards.title: Silver Tongue
body: When this card enters play, add 2 tokens to your trueshot pool. Each hero target gains 1 HP.
Whenever a villain target deals a non-villain target damage, you may remove any number of tokens from your trueshot pool. Reduce that damage by that amount.
cards.flavorText: “Hey! Fox lady! Back off.{BR}This, uh, [b]Alkaline[/b] lady can{BR}make her own decisions.”
cards.flavorReference: Red Rifle, Mist By An inch (EC #16)

cards.title: Situational Awareness
body: Add or remove 3 tokens from your trueshot pool.
If you removed 3 tokens this way, reveal the top 2 cards of any deck. Put 1 on top of the deck and 1 on the bottom of the deck.
Draw or play 1 card.
cards.flavorText: “If you kids hadn't shown up...{BR}Mister Vargas there would have{BR}overloaded my nervous system.”

cards.title: Tech Nerd
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal an Ongoing or Equipment card. Put it into your hand and shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your deck.
You may play an Ongoing or Equipment card now.
If no card entered play this way, add 2 tokens to your trueshot pool, then one hero other than {RedRifle} may draw a card.
cards.flavorText: “Check this out! Nobody, and I{BR}mean nobody, is gonna have{BR}a project [b]this[/b] awesome!”

cards.title: Yelling Information
body: Reduce all damage dealt by 1.
powers: Play the top card of each deck. For each one-shot played this turn, add 1 token to your trueshot pool. Destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “Hey, ugly! Yeah, I'm talkin' to you.{BR}Look, we're just gonna have to ask you{BR}to leave. This plane of existence. Now!”

promoCards.title: Red Rifle
powers: Add 3 tokens to your trueshot pool. Play 1 one-shot card. Remove 2 tokens from your trueshot pool.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power.
One player may discard 2 cards. If they do, they may draw 2 cards.
